H0.text: Dialysis machine is the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H1.text: Electrocardiogram is the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H2.text: Electroencephalogram is a technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

H3.text: Automatic external defibrillators are the technology that enables doctors to monitor the function of the heart.

A4.text: The overall goal of performing an ECG is to obtain information about the electrical functioning of the heart.
